channel.title: Need Help.. RE: Please
channel.description:
Alright umm i'm in a middle of coding a server and i havn't been coding in a while and i forgot how to change the text what the NPC says. Like at home it says Welcome to so and so, and how do i change that? and how do i change; like i added a new home area and i dont know how i make it where a new player logs in there. Help please? Very much appreciated.
Thanks.

item.title: Need Help.. RE: Please
item.dc:creator: @ac3kill3r25 ac3kill3r25
item.description:
@ac3kill3r25 wrote:

I cant find the x coordinates and i actually used your source. How did you change it Nader?

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help.. RE: Please
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Nader Owner Nader
item.description:
@Owner_Nader wrote:

Goto Client.java and change the old home’s coord to the new home’s coords,
And After that goto player.java and edit all the old home coords and change to the new and compile and tell me if its work,

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help.. RE: Please

item.description:

thanks but how do i change the other thing? or do you not know?

item.title: Need Help.. RE: Please
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

Go to NPCHandler.java, and search the text that the NPC is saying, then change it.

Read full topic
